product_name: Hugger Mugger Cotton Yoga Strap with D-Ring - 8'
long_description: With an 8 ft. length suited to taller yogis, the Hugger Mugger 8 ft. Cotton Yoga Strap with metal D-ring buckle will give you years of safe, secure support. Cotton webbing is exceptionally strong(TM)rated to 500 lbs. Sturdy metal D-ring buckle is easy to thread and adjust into position.
short_description: With an 8 ft. length suited to taller yogis, the Hugger Mugger 8 ft. Cotton Yoga Strap with metal D-ring buckle will give you years of safe, secure support.
